targets.rawSql:
with max_block_number_by_chain_from_import_status as materialized (
  select 
    p.chain, 
    max((import_data->'data'->>'chainLatestBlockNumber')::integer) as last_covered
  from import_status i
  join product p on p.product_id = i.product_id
  group by 1
),
max_block_number_by_chain_from_investments as materialized (
  select 
    p.chain, 
    last(block_number, datetime) as last_covered
  from investment_balance_ts i
  join product p on p.product_id = i.product_id
  group by 1
),
max_block_number_by_chain as (
  select 
    im.chain,
    greatest(im.last_covered, coalesce(iv.last_covered, 0)) as last_covered
  from max_block_number_by_chain_from_import_status im
  left join max_block_number_by_chain_from_investments iv on im.chain = iv.chain
),
procuct_block_stats as (
  select 
    p.chain,
    product_key, 
    i.import_data is not null as has_import_status,
    (import_data->'data'->>'contractCreatedAtBlock')::integer as contract_creation_block,
    (import_data->'data'->'coveredBlockRange'->>'from')::integer || '->' || (import_data->'data'->'coveredBlockRange'->>'to')::integer as covered_range,
    b.last_covered as chain_last_block,
    b.last_covered - (import_data->'data'->>'contractCreatedAtBlock')::integer as total_blocks_to_cover,
    (import_data->'data'->'coveredBlockRange'->>'to')::integer - (import_data->'data'->'coveredBlockRange'->>'from')::integer as blocks_covered,
    (b.last_covered - (import_data->'data'->>'contractCreatedAtBlock')::integer)
    -
    ((import_data->'data'->'coveredBlockRange'->>'to')::integer - (import_data->'data'->'coveredBlockRange'->>'from')::integer)
    as rest_to_cover
  from product p
  left join import_status i on p.product_id = i.product_id
  left join max_block_number_by_chain b on p.chain = b.chain
  where p.chain in ($chain)
)
select 
  chain,
  sum(blocks_covered)::double precision / sum(total_blocks_to_cover)::double precision as percent_covered
  /*
  sum(total_blocks_to_cover) as total_blocks_to_cover,
  sum(blocks_covered) as total_blocks_covered,
  sum(rest_to_cover) as total_rest_to_cover*/
from procuct_block_stats
group by 1
order by 1

select 
  investment_data->>'chain' as value, 
  count(*) as metric 
from investment_balance_ts 
group by 1 
order by 1;

with max_block_number_by_chain_from_import_status as materialized (
  select 
    p.chain, 
    max((import_data->'data'->>'chainLatestBlockNumber')::integer) as last_covered
  from import_status i
  join product p on p.product_id = i.product_id
  group by 1
),
max_block_number_by_chain_from_investments as materialized (
  select 
    p.chain, 
    last(block_number, datetime) as last_covered
  from investment_balance_ts i
  join product p on p.product_id = i.product_id
  group by 1
),
max_block_number_by_chain as (
  select 
    im.chain,
    greatest(im.last_covered, coalesce(iv.last_covered, 0)) as last_covered
  from max_block_number_by_chain_from_import_status im
  left join max_block_number_by_chain_from_investments iv on im.chain = iv.chain
)
select 
  product_key, 
  i.import_data is not null as has_import_status,
  (import_data->'data'->>'contractCreatedAtBlock')::integer as contract_creation_block,
  (import_data->'data'->'coveredBlockRange'->>'from')::integer || '->' || (import_data->'data'->'coveredBlockRange'->>'to')::integer as covered_range,
  b.last_covered as chain_last_block,
  b.last_covered - (import_data->'data'->>'contractCreatedAtBlock')::integer as total_blocks_to_cover,
  (import_data->'data'->'coveredBlockRange'->>'to')::integer - (import_data->'data'->'coveredBlockRange'->>'from')::integer as blocks_covered,
  (b.last_covered - (import_data->'data'->>'contractCreatedAtBlock')::integer)
  -
  ((import_data->'data'->'coveredBlockRange'->>'to')::integer - (import_data->'data'->'coveredBlockRange'->>'from')::integer)
  as rest_to_cover
from product p
left join import_status i on p.product_id = i.product_id
left join max_block_number_by_chain b on p.chain = b.chain
where p.chain in ($chain)

SELECT *
FROM
  product
where product_id not in (
  select product_id
  from import_status
)
